title: CoverSutra Is Back
author: John Gruber
excerpt: Long buried, but never forgotten. A lost love from the past is about to rise again. After years of silence, she stirs—ready to rise from the dead, louder than ever!
text: CoverSutra Returns from the Dead — Your New Music Sidekick, Right from the Menu Bar. CoverSutra started as an iTunes controller in 2007, and now it’s back as a standalone Music player for your Mac! CoverSutra 4.0 gives you seamless access to your music right from your menu bar. Quickly search by album, artist, or song instantly—all while you work without switching apps. What's New in Version 4.0? A Full Menu Bar Music Player: CoverSutra 4.0 is no longer just a controller. It’s a complete Apple Music player that sits comfortably in your menu bar. Instant Music Search: Search your Apple Music library by artist, album, or song title—without leaving whatever you’re working on. Global Keyboard Shortcuts: Keep your flow with global shortcuts to control your music from anywhere. Skip, pause, and search—all without breaking your stride. Available Now on the Mac App Store! For a limited time, CoverSutra 4.0 is available at an introductory price of $4.99. If you’ve previously purchased version 3.0 on the Mac App Store, this upgrade is free! Download Now & Start Listening P.S. Share your music journey! Use CoverSutra 4.0 and let us know what you think. Your feedback keeps the music playing!
html:
CoverSutra Returns from the Dead — Your New Music Sidekick, Right from the Menu Bar.

CoverSutra started as an iTunes controller in 2007, and now it’s back as a standalone Music player for your Mac! CoverSutra 4.0 gives you seamless access to your music right from your menu bar. Quickly search by album, artist, or song instantly—all while you work without switching apps.

What's New in Version 4.0?

A Full Menu Bar Music Player: CoverSutra 4.0 is no longer just a controller. It’s a complete Apple Music player that sits comfortably in your menu bar.

Instant Music Search: Search your Apple Music library by artist, album, or song title—without leaving whatever you’re working on.

Global Keyboard Shortcuts: Keep your flow with global shortcuts to control your music from anywhere. Skip, pause, and search—all without breaking your stride.

Available Now on the Mac App Store! For a limited time, CoverSutra 4.0 is available at an introductory price of $4.99.

If you’ve previously purchased version 3.0 on the Mac App Store, this upgrade is free!

Download Now & Start Listening
